nodes.text: Agriworld-2079 in the Mid Rim was the homeworld of the Skrilling species. Agriworld-2079 was a M'shinni designation, as was Skrilling. The original names of the Skrilling people and of their homeworld were lost to history.

Discovered by the non-native M'shinni species circa 3000 BBY, they colonized the planet as an agriworld for the Galactic Republic at a point before the Skrillings had developed advanced technology. Claiming the planet as their own, they placed the Skrillings in restricted reservations, causing a mass exodus from the world.
During the Galactic Civil War, some Skrillings were active in a movement to free their ancestral homeworld.
